author: rvesse
msg: Add documentation to TransformFilterInequality describing why it is off by default and how to enable it where desired (JENA-615)

author: colen
msg: OPENNLP-81 Added doccat evaluator, with misclassified and fine grained reports.

author: markt
msg: Add a work around for validating XML documents (often TLDs) that use just the file name to refer to refer to the JavaEE schema on which they are based.

author: markt
msg: Backport refactoring of AbstractReplicatedMap to implement Map rather than extend  ConcurrentHashMap to enable Tomcat 7 to be built with Java 8.

author: tripod
msg: OAK-1720 PermissionValidator may throw AccessDenied if testing for NO_PERMISSION
